titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal excise taxes on gasoline and diesel fuel collected from vehicles shall be used exclusively for purposes of meeting the Nation's surface transportation needs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal excise tax on gasoline and diesel fuel collected from vehicles shall be used exclusively for purposes of meeting the Nation's surface transportation needs.
